page.title: 07Industry-service employment
page.content: There is a very large transport depot at Stoke Orchard run by a company called Santa Fe Express.This company which employs 35 people transports goods throughout the UK. and to countries in Europe.The large warehouse was previously used by the Tate and Lyle sugar company as a store and distribution point.During the Second World War (1939-45),the building was used as a tank depot. Large lorries which use the quiet country lane are a cause for concern amongst the local inhabitants. Inside the Santa Fe depot there are several "starter" industries which have developed in recent years.The rents and rates are cheaper than those of Cheltenham and are thus attractive to businessmen starting up on their own.
